name: Escape the Lab (itch) (Justi1337)
description:
This game will probably make you rage, so if you are a person who gets mad quickly, don't play this.

Controls: 

move with WSAD

Switch guns with 1,2,3

ability: Q to activate, teleports you randomly on the level, if the bar goes down it           teleports you back, or you can reactivate it with e.

The ability takes away some health
